description:
Crush your ride, and only your ride. The North Shore Chamois shorts combine the support of BN3TH boxers with the protection and comfort of a cycling short. A mesh back panel vents excess heat and an antimicrobial treatment means you can wear them more and wash them less.

  • Wicking fabric contains 7% Ionic+™ polyester with a permanent silver anti-odour treatment
  • MyPakage technology 3-dimensional pouch provides excellent support
  • Sea To Sky chamois provides 15mm of padding for comfort on mid-distance rides
  • Silicone beading on hem and waist prevents riding up
name: BN3TH Cycling Padded Chamois Boxer North Shore Shorts - Men's
